properties.Name: Passive 1 - NW
properties.Comments: Hydro Pole - Wooden - 011522 or L4855 - Sign "If work on this pole is neccesary Haldimand County Hydro 905-765-5211 - Access to pole is good - good distance from road 25 feet +, good safe area to pull over - No obstructions to the E/S/W

properties.Name: Passive 2 - N
properties.Comments: Hydro Pole - Wooden - 009649 or D4BB4Y - Sign "If work on this pole is neccesary Haldimand County Hydro 905-765-5211 - Access to farmers field will be better for access to pole / setting up a ladder - ditch along side of road - SW quadrant is free from obstruction.

properties.Comments: Hydro Pole - Wooden - 011176 or D4BCYF - No Obstruction  - Sign "If work on this pole is neccesary Haldimand County Hydro  905-765-5211 - Access to pole is good, ditch.

properties.Name: Passive 4 - SE
properties.Comments: Hydro Pole - Wooden - 010984 or D3J4FC - No Obstruction  - Sign "If work on this pole is neccesary Haldimand County Hydro  905-765-5211 - Access to pole is good - Overall pretty open, some sumac that could be cut back - Stelco Fenceline across street - Good access to pull over, parking lot for coveyor belt.

properties.Name: Passive 5 - S
properties.Comments: Hydro Pole - Wooden - 010735 or D3J3YP - No Obstruction  - Sign "If work on this pole is neccesary Haldimand County Hydro  905-765-5211 - Access to pole is good - Overall pretty open, pine tree to the west - Stelco Fenceline.

properties.Name: Passive 6 - SW
properties.Comments: Hydro Pole - Wooden - 010974 or D378W - No Obstruction  - Sign "If work on this pole is neccesary Haldimand County Hydro  905-765-5211 - Access to pole is okay / setting up a ladder from road over the ditch - Overall pretty open -  Across street from Famrers Field .
